comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for users who have "view-only" access, indicating they can only view content without making changes. It appears in the PublicRoomPage and is likely associated with a button or toggle that controls this access level.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "yalnız baxış üçün" is understandable, it's a very literal and somewhat clunky translation of 'view-only'. A more natural and idiomatic Azerbaijani translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "sərfəli baxış" or "təkcə baxış" or "yalnız oxumaq üçün" depending on the specific context. These options convey the meaning more naturally.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Nur-Ansicht" is understandable, it's not the most idiomatic or precise translation of 'view-only'.  A more common and accurate translation would be 'schreibgeschützt' or 'Nurlesen'.

While 'katselunäkymä' is a valid Finnish word, it's a rather literal and cumbersome translation of 'view-only'. A more natural and commonly used term would be 'lukunäkymä' or potentially 'vain luku' depending on the context.

The Armenian translation "միայն դիտելու համար" (miayn ditealu hamar) is a literal translation of 'only for viewing' and doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'view-only'. It's accurate in meaning but lacks the brevity and directness of the English term. A more idiomatic and concise translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "դիտելու ընդամենայնայնպես" (ditealu endamanynpes - strictly for viewing) or "դիտողական" (ditogakan - viewing only/read-only), depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ຊົມສະບຽງເທົ່ານັ້ນ" does not accurately convey the meaning of "view-only".  "ຊົມສະບຽງ" literally translates to 'watching a feast' or 'watching a ceremony'. It's not the correct term for a 'view-only' access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more appropriate translation might be something like "ເບິ່ງຢ່າງດຽວ" (beng yang diao), which means 'view only', or "ອະນຸຍາດໃຫ້ເບິ່ງຢ່າງດຽວ" (anuat hai beng yang diao) which means 'permission to view only'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "alleen bekijken" is understandable, a more idiomatic and precise translation of "view-only" in Dutch would be "weergave-only" or "uitsluitend bekijken". "Alleen bekijken" implies simply viewing, but doesn't convey the restriction implied by 'view-only'.

While "doar vizualizare" is understandable, it's not the most natural or idiomatic translation of "view-only". It's a literal translation. A better option would convey the same meaning more elegantly.

The Sinhala translation 'ප්‍රදර්ශන පමණයි' (pradashana pamaṇai) translates more closely to 'exhibition only' or 'display only', not 'view-only'. It doesn't convey the meaning of read-only access or a non-editable view.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'බැලීම පමණයි' (belima pamaṇai) which directly translates to 'view only' or 'reading only' or 'පාඨක පත්‍රිකාව පමණයි' (pathaka pathrikawa pamaṇai) meaning 'read-only document'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "len na zobrazenie" is understandable, it's not the most natural or precise translation of "view-only." It's a bit literal. A more common and idiomatic translation would be "iba na čítanie" or "prezeranie".

While "само за преглед" is a literal translation of "view-only", it doesn't fully capture the nuance of the English term in a technical context.  'view-only' often implies read-only access, preventing modifications.  'само за преглед' is more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'само за читање' (only for reading) or 'недозвољено за уређивање' (editing not allowed) to better convey the intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'samo za pregled' while understandable, isn't the most accurate or common translation of 'view-only'. A more direct and widely understood translation would be 'vidljivo samo za čitanje'.

The translation "salt görüntüleme" does not accurately convey the meaning of "view-only." "Salt" means salt and is irrelevant. "Görüntüleme" means viewing or display, but the combination doesn't capture the concept of read-only access.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "sadece görüntüleme" (only viewing) or "erişimi kısıtlı görüntüleme" (restricted viewing) or "yalnızca okuma" (read-only).
